verses.verse: Therefore, <WG5620> my brothers <WG80>dearly beloved <WG27> and longed <WG1973> for, my joy <WG5479> and crown, <WG4735> so <WG3779> stand <WG4739> fast in the Lord, <WG2962> my dearly beloved. <WG27>
I beseech <WG3870> Euodias, <WG2136> and beseech <WG3870> Syntyche, <WG4941> that they be of the same <WG846> mind <WG5426> in the Lord. <WG2962>

And I entreat <WG2065> you also, <WG2532> true <WG1103> yoke fellow, <WG4805> help <WG4815> those <WG846> women which <WG3748> labored <WG4866> with me in the gospel, <WG2098> with Clement <WG2815> also, <WG2532> and with other <WG3062> my fellow laborers, <WG4904> whose <WG3739> names <WG3686> are in the book <WG976> of life. <WG2222>
Rejoice <WG5463> in the Lord <WG2962> always: <WG104> and again <WG3825> I say, <WG2046> Rejoice. <WG5463>
Let your <WG5216> moderation <WG1933> be known <WG1097> to all <WG3956> men. <WG444> The Lord <WG2962> is at <WG1451> hand. <WG1451>

Be careful <WG3309> for nothing; <WG3367> but in every <WG3956> thing by prayer <WG4335> and supplication <WG1162> with thanksgiving <WG2169> let your <WG5216> requests <WG155> be made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to God. <WG2316>

And the peace <WG1515> of God, <WG2316> which <WG3588> passes <WG5242> all <WG3956> understanding, <WG3563> shall keep <WG5432> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> and minds <WG3540> through <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Finally, <WG3063> brothers, <WG80> whatever <WG3745> things are true, <WG227> whatever <WG3745> things are honest, <WG4586> whatever <WG3745> things are just, <WG1342> whatever <WG3745> things are pure, <WG53> whatever <WG3745> things are lovely, <WG4375> whatever <WG3745> things are of good <WG2163> report; <WG2163> if <WG1487> there be any <WG1536> virtue, <WG703> and if <WG1487> there be any <WG1536> praise, <WG1868> think <WG3049> on these <WG5023> things.

Those <WG5023> things, which <WG3739> you have <WG2192> both <WG2532> learned, <WG3129> and received, <WG3880> and heard, <WG191> and seen <WG1492> in me, do: <WG4238> and the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> shall be with you.

But I rejoiced <WG5463> in the Lord <WG2962> greatly, <WG3171> that now <WG2236> at <WG4218> the last <WG4218> your <WG3588> care <WG5426> of me has flourished <WG330> again; <WG330> wherein <WG1909> <WG3757> you were also <WG2532> careful, <WG5426> but you lacked <WG170> opportunity. <WG170>
Not that I speak <WG3004> in respect <WG2596> of want: <WG5304> for I have learned, <WG3129> in whatever <WG3588> <WG3739> state I am, <WG1510> therewith to be content. <WG842>

I know <WG1492> both <WG2532> how to be abased, <WG5013> and I know <WG1492> how to abound: <WG4052> every <WG3956> where <WG1722> <WG3956> and in all <WG3956> things I am instructed <WG3453> both <WG2532> to be full <WG5526> and to be hungry, <WG3983> both <WG2532> to abound <WG4052> and to suffer <WG5302> need.
I can <WG2480> do <WG2480> all <WG3956> things through <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> which <WG3588> strengthens <WG1743> me.
Notwithstanding <WG4133> you have well <WG2573> done, <WG4160> that you did communicate <WG4790> with my affliction. <WG2347>

Now <WG1161> you Philippians <WG5374> know <WG1492> also, <WG2532> that in the beginning <WG746> of the gospel, <WG2098> when <WG3753> I departed <WG1831> from Macedonia, <WG3109> no <WG3762> church <WG1577> communicated <WG2841> with me as concerning <WG1519> <WG3056> giving <WG1394> and receiving, <WG3028> but you only. <WG3441>
For even <WG2532> in Thessalonica <WG2332> you sent <WG3992> once <WG530> and again <WG1364> to my necessity. <WG5532>
Not because <WG3754> I desire <WG1934> a gift: <WG1390> but I desire <WG1934> fruit <WG2590> that may abound <WG4121> to your <WG5216> account. <WG3056>

But I have <WG568> all, <WG3956> and abound: <WG4052> I am full, <WG4137> having received <WG1209> of Epaphroditus <WG1891> the things which were sent from you, an odor <WG3744> of a sweet <WG2175> smell, <WG2175> a sacrifice <WG2378> acceptable, <WG1184> well pleasing <WG2101> to God. <WG2316>
But my God <WG2316> shall supply <WG4137> all <WG3956> your <WG5216> need <WG5532> according <WG2596> to his riches <WG4149> in glory <WG1391> by Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
Now <WG1161> to God <WG2316> and our Father <WG3962> be glory <WG1391> for ever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
Salute <WG782> every <WG3956> saint <WG40> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424> The brothers <WG80> which are with me greet <WG782> you.
All <WG3956> the saints <WG40> salute <WG782> you, chiefly <WG3122> they that are of Caesar's <WG2541> household. <WG3614>
The grace <WG5485> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with you all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG281> To the Philippians written from Rome, by Epaphroditus.
